subject: Your online game account password
text:
This e-mail is being sent to you because attempted access to your account password failed 
_and_ this re-send the password was requested: https://robert.hurst-ri.us/games/dankdomain 

You sign in using your: 

Player ID: 	${player.id}  (${player.handle}) 
Password: 	${player.password} 

If this e-mail was not sent by you having registered, please take no action, 
as this game account will automatically deactivate itself.  

For the latest developments with Dank Domain: 

	https://www.npmjs.com/package/dankdomain

Happy hunting!
